Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products 25-OH Vitamin D Total Reagent Pack
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products 25-OH Vitamin D Total Calibrators
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products 25-OH Vitamin D Total Reagent Pack and Calibrators for quantitative measurement of total 25-OH vitamin D in human serum using VITROS automated immunodiagnostic systems
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative measurement of total 25-OH vitamin D in human serum to assist in assessment of vitamin D sufficiency, and for calibration of VITROS ECi/ECiQ, 3600, and 5600 systems for this purpose
